hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Milk Bottle#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found in #the Market#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path of #gold#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: You're playing a Randomizer. I'm randomized!^${12 48 31}Here's a random number:  #4#.&Enjoy your Randomizer!

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path of #gold#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the souls of the Wallmaster# can be found in #the Market#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Dampé's Hut#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Green Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Kokiri Shop#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Did you know that the solution to the Truth Spinner in Shadow Temple is never one of the two positions closest to the initial position?

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #a Huge Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a record setting fish (adult)# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Claim Check# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.
